item.title: Indiranagar vs Subramanyapura
item.description: There’s a lot to unpack just from saying ‘Indira-nagar’ versus ‘Subramanya-pura’â€” one gives off a cool-and-hip vibe, while the other feels more like traditional Indian family vibe. I rented a room in the first for the past year to be closer to work, while the latter has been my home (technically my parents’) for more than 10 years through school and college before that. Indiranagar seems like an unusual island isolated from the rest of India - in demeanor and culturally.
